Title: Visualisation of diffusion and ordering processes in intermetallic alloys
Description: Visualisation of diffusion and ordering processes in intermetallic alloys using WPF 3D and C#.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Visualisation of diffusion and ordering processes in intermetallic alloys using WPF 3D and C#.

The structure of complex metallic alloy (CMA) beta-Mg2Al3 has very interesting and still unclear properties.
The current project focus on the visualisation of the most stable structure of atomic positions in 3D space.



How to use?

A .chmc file in mandatory (folder with 31 .chmc files is included in release). Open File button opens the file and generates models.

To process a group of file the user needs to click Process Files button and open a folder with group of .chmc files e.g. one included in release.
